channel.title: Sowwii
channel.description: had to remove cus source code inih.

item.title: Sowwii
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“relexlawl, post:8, topic:465720”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=571819.msg4136953#msg4136953 date=1351796450]

According to java conventions when a variable is something that should not be changed (constant) anywhere else it should be uppercase so:

public static final String MESSAGES [] =

To get a random string from the array just do

MESSAGES[Misc.random(MESSAGES.length)]

And quite honestly, when I think of creating a new class I do it because I want to make something more OO, not just to declare an array and add a method.

my class isn’t just a whole class with an array and a execution method, lol.
[/quote]

Well is there anything in your class that makes it more OO? XD

Either way, I don’t really think OO is needed for something that only needs a String (messages), which is why I didn’t really like this being handled in a new file, but I guess that’s your choice/personal preference if you decided to do it.[/quote]

your right, i wouldn’t of created a whole new class if i didn’t add anything else in it, but i have and will.

Read full topic

item.title: Sowwii
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:7, topic:465720”][quote author=relexlawl link=topic=571819.msg4136945#msg4136945 date=1351795852]
According to java conventions when a variable is something that should not be changed (constant) anywhere else it should be uppercase so:

public static final String MESSAGES [] =

To get a random string from the array just do

MESSAGES[Misc.random(MESSAGES.length)]

And quite honestly, when I think of creating a new class I do it because I want to make something more OO, not just to declare an array and add a method.

[/quote]

my class isn’t just a whole class with an array and a execution method, lol.[/quote]

Well is there anything in your class that makes it more OO? XD

Either way, I don’t really think OO is needed for something that only needs a String (messages), which is why I didn’t really like this being handled in a new file, but I guess that’s your choice/personal preference if you decided to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Sowwii
item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

Highly doubt you will need to edit it that often that it would make you go to the extend of loading a file for it

Don’t get me wrong, loading things from a file is great, but only for certain things, i.e shops or maybe dialogues, something that you will need to edit from time to time during server run-time.

Read full topic

item.title: Sowwii
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“relexlawl, post:4, topic:465720”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=571819.msg4136946#msg4136946 date=1351795922]
You could have them load from a file to be more dynamic

http://pastie.org/5168006
[/quote]

No need to parse it from a file when you can just directly grab it from the array.[/quote]

But then to add more messages, you must add them into the array, compile the file, and restart the server. If you’re loading from an external file, you can simply reload it.

Read full topic
